channel.title: [ALERT] <<<<<Devil-Reality IF YOU'VE PLAYED YOU ARE AT RISK, VIRUS >>>>>
channel.description:
LOGIN GO TO QUEST TAB CHOOSE WHAT PKING SET U WANT....>>>go ** m<<<<<
Website. Join us Today... **
Devil-reality is an Instant Pking Server.
This basically means there's no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM or from PKing. This means our items will have value, making everything more fun, giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally get that kill for rare items. There are tons of different ways to exchange your items including specific market areas, clan chats, and even a dedicated section on forums. Being a new server we want to get our economy right the first time. To ensure we achieve this we have made drop rates at a perfect level to maintain item drops for PvMers, but also to give just enough that we're not flooded with items and massive inflation like you see on most other private servers.
What Devil-reality is about:
Devil-reality community is like no other! As soon as you join you will notice our active wilderness, active forums, and active PvMing and Clanning communities. Here at Devil-reality, we don’t like to mess around, we want to bring you the players the best possible experience that we can give you.
Our community gives a warm welcome to all new players, and presents them with many opportunity to get involded with activities and get to know existing members. We have many events and tournaments in and out of the wilderness that makes this possible. These can be anything from Clan based PKing, to a simple games of Hide and Seek.
The Devil-reality Staff Team:
All of Devil-reality staff are hand-picked based off applications anyone is free to submit. These application then get voted on by our staff team and those few that provide the best application will get a chance to prove them selves by starting as a Server Support member. Not only do we make sure we have staff from EVERY different time zone. We make sure we have the nicest most helpful staff available for you. Many of our staff all have previous experience from other major private Server, mainly Near Reality, which means you get professional support and help when every you may need it.
Devil-reality Development & Progress:
The development team here at Devil-reality knows quality updates have to come from what the community wants. Once you’ve become a part of the spectacular Devil-reality community, you’ll notice weekly updates, with content polls that you can vote on to bring what you want and enjoy into the game. Alternatively you can put your ideas forward as suggestions on our forums and have your voice heard and see your ideas implemented if fellow players support you.
Welcome, to the server [img]http://i.imgur.com/o0uLzLD.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WkvXq9K.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/mdRH679.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uuMl0xv.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/eDDXHDw.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YhzATY3.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TJy8VjI.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qtX69kR.png?1[/img]

item.title: [ALERT] <<<<<Devil-Reality IF YOU'VE PLAYED YOU ARE AT RISK, VIRUS >>>>>
item.dc:creator: @fuzzout fuzzout
item.description:
@fuzzout wrote:

I was just looking at the ridiculousness of it all… and then I spotted: “Karamel” and my brain went “I’m done.”. I think it’s time for bed for me. XD 8:37 AM.

Read full topic

item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“DeathsChaos9, post:11, topic:553481”][quote author=Eyeownyew link=topic=672395.msg4496902#msg4496902 date=1444152231]
you really couldn’t have chosen a less ridiculous title to alert people of malicious content? what the hell, are we 8?
[/quote]
Based on the maturity of our members where would you speculate the average age to be?

[quote author=Justin Bieber link=topic=672395.msg4496907#msg4496907 date=1444155534]

you really couldn’t have chosen a less ridiculous title to alert people of malicious content? what the hell, are we 8?
[/quote]ikr rofl, and what’s with the random apostrophe in ALERT

Don’t do drugs kids…[/quote]
16? and apparently the fucking mods are 12?

item.title: [ALERT] <<<<<Devil-Reality IF YOU'VE PLAYED YOU ARE AT RISK, VIRUS >>>>>
item.dc:creator: @Jumbabwe Jumbabwe
item.description:
@Jumbabwe wrote:

This shit came with a fucking trojan. I rebooted my computer and tried to delete something called Devil-Reality.jar in the startup folder in appdata or something like that. It kept removing administrator permissions, so I checked out the running processes and something called clientmonitor.exe was running. It wouldn’t allow me to end it. I had to use antivirus software to remove it.

Read full topic
item.source: [ALERT] <<<<<Devil-Reality IF YOU'VE PLAYED YOU ARE AT RISK, VIRUS >>>>>
